EmailTemplate.name: 02-2016 Town Hall.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Join us for the February Town Hall
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Not sure if you saw this email, but we have a few slots still open for this month's Town Hall <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5863786043245097730]]>. I hope you can attend to learn about product enhancements and participate in a Q&A session I'm hosting with our CEO, Brent Bellm.
Don't forget to register <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5863786043245097730]]> and save your spot.
Kind regards,
Tim Schulz Chief Product Officer
---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: The Bigcommerce Team Subject: Join us for the February Town Hall To: {{lead.Email Address}}
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re excited to invite you to our next Bigcommerce Town Hall <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com” style=]]>. During this monthly conversation, our Bigcommerce Chief Executive Officer Brent Bellm and Chief Product Officer Tim Schulz will give you a detailed look at recent platform enhancements and what's up next.
Bigcommerce Town Hall <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com” style=]]>
When: December 17, 2015 from 3–4pm ET
What: An in-depth look at the latest improvements including Stencil, Square, social integrations (Facebook, Pinterest, and Twitter), 2016 product roadmap, and time for Q&A
Presenters: CEO Brent Bellm and CPO Tim Schulz
Where: If applicable
Reserve your spot <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5863786043245097730]]>
We’ll hold a live Q&A session during the Town Hall, but you can also submit questions in advance by commenting in our community forum <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com” style=]]>.
If you’re unable to join us, don’t worry — we’ll record each Town Hall and post the video in the forum
Hope to see you there,
The Bigcommerce Team
